bilingual.target: 消费者市场在不断变化。

bilingual.source: The economy is fueled by consumer spending.
bilingual.target: 经济是由消费者支出驱动的。
经济衰退使减弱了消费者的支出。

bilingual.source: Consumer watchdogs protect the rights of the public.
bilingual.target: 消费者监督者保护公众的权益。
广告可以极大地影响消费者的行为。

bilingual.source: Deflation can lead to a decrease in consumer spending.
bilingual.target: 通货紧缩可能导致消费者支出减少。

bilingual.source: A satisfied consumer is likely to return for more purchases.
bilingual.target: 满意的消费者可能会再次购买。

bilingual.source: Market supervision is very important for consumer protection.
bilingual.target: 市场监管对消费者保护非常重要。

bilingual.source: Understanding consumer trends is important for businesses.
bilingual.target: 了解消费者的发展趋势对企业很重要。

bilingual.source: Retailers need to adapt to changing consumer preferences.
bilingual.target: 零售商需要适应不断变化的消费者偏好。

list.abstract: Consumer，英文单词，意思是消费者。

yingyinNormal.en: Freaked out? Hey no, I'm not freaked out. I'm indignant. As a consumer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吓坏了？我才没有，我是个愤怒的消费者。

yingyinNormal.en: It sells. It sells quite a bit. It becomes a commodity. It becomes an item that the consumer wants.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它卖出去了,而且卖得很好。这成了一种商品成了一种消费者想要的物品。

yingyinNormal.en: The future world, the business is C2B not B2C, C2B is consumer to business, not business to consumer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 未来的世界，生意将是C2B而不是B2C，是用户改变企业，而不是企业向用户出售。

yingyinNormal.en: Not to the consumer. Well, then maybe your consumer should start to learn how to... How to even work that, don't you think?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但对客户来说不是。也许对你的客户来说是他们得开始学习怎样... 怎么去用它，你觉得对吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So, demo it to the consumer. And market the components separately.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，把它展示给客户，作为部件推向市场。

yingyinNormal.en: I can see why she deleted it. It's a consumer safety evaluation for their 5K system.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白她为什么删除它了，这是5K系统的消费安全评价。

yingyinNormal.en: But what would have happened if I had said C? Consumer applications for genomics, they will flourish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我选的是C呢？基因组学的消费需求将大大增加。

yingyinNormal.en: Newly discovered fields in the U.S. led to a boom in the 1950s, driven by growing industrial and consumer needs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 近期在美国发现了几处天然气，使二十世纪五十年代的美国很是繁荣，这被用于逐渐发展的工业和居民生活。

yingyinNormal.en: That innovation is what made possible our modern consumer culture by enabling a low-unit cost for manufactured goods.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这项创新通过低成本的生产商品造就了现代消费文化。

yingyinNormal.en: Paisley Group already leads the other Fortune 500 companies in the global and industry trend toward consumer use of green products.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩斯利集团已经在引领其他财富五百强企业向着绿色能耗的全球和行业趋势方向发展。

yingyinNormal.en: So, while this would stimulate business, it would also encourage over consumption, or hoarding commodities, like food and fuel, raising their prices and leading to consumer shortages and even more inflation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这虽然能刺激商业活动，但也会造成过度消费或大量囤货，例如食物和燃料，使得价格攀升，导致供不应求，通膨更加恶化。

yingyinNormal.en: So, while this would stimulate business, it would also encourage over consumption, or hoarding commodities, like food and fuel, raising their prices and leading to consumer shortages and even more inflation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这虽然能刺激商业活动，但也会造成过度消费或大量囤货，例如食物和燃料，使得价格攀升，导致供不应求，通膨更加恶化。

yingyinNormal.en: But deflation would make people want to hold onto their money, and a decrease in consumer spending would reduce business profits, leading to more unemployment and a further decrease in spending, causing the economy to keep shrinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，通货紧缩会让人不愿花钱，减少消费支出，造成商业利润下跌，失业率升高，进一步重挫消费，导致经济不断紧缩。

yingyinNormal.en: But deflation would make people want to hold onto their money, and a decrease in consumer spending would reduce business profits, leading to more unemployment and a further decrease in spending, causing the economy to keep shrinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，通货紧缩会让人不愿花钱，减少消费支出，造成商业利润下跌，失业率升高，进一步重挫消费，导致经济不断紧缩。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The additional regulations under the CCPA are intended to protect <highlight>consumers</highlight> from being tricked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: CCPA的附加规定旨在保护消费者免受欺骗。

examination_example.sentence: Something that should be simple and transparent can be complicated, intentionally or unintentionally, in ways that impair <highlight>consumer</highlight> choice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本来应该简单易懂的事情可能会有意或无意地变得复杂，从而有损消费者的选择。

examination_example.sentence: The industry is betting that the same <highlight>consumers</highlight> paying more for premium attributes such as free-range, non-GMO, and pasture-raised eggs will embrace sustainability.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The move was a switch to leverage on the coverage of their fashion week show to make stock available immediately to <highlight>consumers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一举措是为了利用时装周的报道，让消费者可以立即买到商品。

examination_example.sentence: The news has left investors and <highlight>consumers</highlight> outraged but comes as little surprise to those in the fashion industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一消息让投资者和消费者感到愤怒，但对时装业的人来说并不意外。

examination_example.sentence: They cause anxiety about food among <highlight>consumers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们引起消费者对食品的焦虑。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: "The most famous designers are Chinese, so are the models, and so are the <highlight>consumers</highlight>, " she says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “最著名的设计师是中国人，模特也是，消费者也是，”她说。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese women are not just <highlight>consumers</highlight> of fashion - they are central to its movement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国女性不仅仅是时尚界的消费者，她们还是这项运动的中心。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers also explored what would happen if <highlight>consumers</highlight> replaced old products with new electronics that serve more than one function.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员也探讨了如果消费者用提供多种功能的新电子产品取代旧产品会发生什么。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 消耗, 消费
